I'm afraid you've got the wrong address.

I'm sorry. I didn't mean to offend you.
However, he's a potential business partner. He deserves our respect.

Beautiful women are heaven for the eyes

but you need to have balls to do this job.

translation.es: Pensé que en lo relativo a preferencias sexuales,

It was possible because of my strategy.
Age and sex had nothing to do with it.

translation.es: En un mes, la compraré por una miseria,

Damn, I have to finish this.
Give me like half an hour, okay?

We have a plane to catch in the morning.
You shouldn't strain yourself with that weak heart of yours.

translation.es: ¡Bromeaba! Lo siento. Me refería a mi querida Laura,

Jesus, Martin, you are such a dumbass.
To be honest... I didn't order it.

Debe ser cortesía de la casa.

No. Wait, I have to go to the bathroom.

translation.en: - It was just like him. - Yeah.
Look! Our wine is here. That's what I'm talking about.
translation.es: ¡Mira! Llegó nuestro vino. Esto sí es vida.

translation.en: God, why do these seagulls have to be so loud?

translation.en: As you can see, the child is playing in the wading pool.
translation.es: Como puedes ver, el niño juega en la piscina.

translation.en: I don't know. He wasn't there when I woke up.
translation.es: Ni idea. No estaba cuando desperté.

translation.en: I don't know where he is. He doesn't answer his phone.
translation.es: No sé dónde está. No atiende el teléfono.

translation.en: The next one is just a year away.
You know what? I'm not the most important thing to him.
translation.es: Soy lo más importante para él.

translation.en: In Martin's hierarchy, I'm way behind his buddies and his work.
translation.es: En la pirámide de Martin, estoy bajo sus amigos y trabajo.

translation.en: And most importantly, way behind him.
translation.es: Y, sobre todo, debajo de él.

translation.en: How are you? How about lunch?
Etna. You were sleeping like a log. Didn't want to wake you. Time's a- wasting.
translation.es: En el Etna. No quise despertarte. Aproveché el tiempo.

translation.en: Yeah, time's a- wasting. Did you have fun?
Jesus. It was fucking awesome. You would have liked it.
translation.es: Fue increíble, carajo. Te habría gustado.

translation.en: You can experience the sea and snow at the same time. Cool!
translation.es: Ves el mar y la nieve al mismo tiempo.

translation.en: Idiot! Don't you remember? We were supposed to go there together!
Why have you left me all alone on my birthday?
Jesus. Don't get so worked up.
With your weak heart, you shouldn't do that.
translation.es: No es bueno para el corazón.

translation.en: Fuck off with that heart argument again.
Do you care about anything other than yourself?
translation.es: ¿Te importa algo más que tú mismo?

translation.en: - What am I to you? - You think I don't care about you?
translation.es: - ¿Qué soy para ti? - ¿Crees que no me importas?

translation.en: I've been looking for this for over an hour.
You had a bad reaction to the sedative.
translation.es: Tuviste una mala reacción al sedante.

translation.en: I didn't know you have a heart problem.
translation.es: No sabía que sufrías del corazón.

translation.en: Why am I here? Who the fuck you are? And why are you keeping me here?
translation.es: ¿Qué hago aquí? ¿Quién mierda eres? ¿Por qué me tienes aquí?

translation.en: - Sit. I don't want you to faint again. - Answer me.
translation.es: - Siéntate. No quiero que te desmayes. - Responde.

translation.en: - Sit down. - I'm not your property!
Do you wanna know why you are here, or not?
Thank you. I think you should have a drink.
What I am about to tell you is so incredible that I...
I wouldn't have believed it's true until I saw you at the airport.
translation.es: ...que solo lo creí cuando te vi en el aeropuerto.

translation.en: In that moment, I understood that...
Five years ago, my whole life was changed.
translation.es: Hace cinco años, mi vida cambió.

translation.en: The bullet went through his heart...
I thought I would die too.
When my heart stop, I saw you.
translation.es: Te vi cuando se me paró el corazón.

translation.en: Every day, I had this image in front of my eyes.
translation.es: Todos los días, recordaba esa imagen.

translation.en: I was looking for you around the world.
translation.es: Te busqué por todo el mundo.

translation.en: I had this feeling of certainty that...
one day you would stand in front of me and be mine.
translation.es: ...de que un día te vería y serías mía.

translation.en: Nobody owns me. I'm not an object.
translation.es: Nadie es mi dueño ni soy un objeto.

translation.en: You can't have me just like that; kidnap me and think that I'm all yours.
translation.es: No puedes secuestrarme y pensar que soy toda tuya.

translation.en: But that's why I'm giving you a chance to fall in love with me.
translation.es: Por eso te doy la oportunidad de enamorarte de mí.

translation.en: Not because I made you do it,
But I've got a boyfriend who is going to look for me.
translation.es: Mi novio me va a buscar.

translation.en: I don't need a chance for love from you!
So, I kindly ask you to let me the fuck out!
translation.es: ¡Te pido amablemente que me dejes ir, carajo!

translation.en: My people have taken your stuff from the room...
and left a note for Martin. It says that...
translation.es: ...y dejó una nota para Martin para avisarle...

translation.en: you're coming back to Poland, moving out...
I won't do anything without your permission.
translation.es: No haré nada sin tu permiso.

translation.en: I'll wait until you want me,
you desire me, and come to me yourself.
translation.es: me desees y vengas a mí.

translation.en: I'm not used to tolerating disobedience.
translation.es: No estoy acostumbrado a tolerar la desobediencia.

translation.en: I'd do anything so you can fall in love with me.
translation.es: Haré lo que sea para enamorarte.

translation.en: If next year, on your birthday, nothing change, I'll set you free.
translation.es: Te liberaré si te sientes igual en tu próximo cumpleaños.

translation.en: Now, you put down the gun...
or this will be stop being funny.
Do you really wanna kill me?
Many have tried. It's not that easy.
translation.es: Muchos lo han intentado. No es tan fácil.

translation.en: The conflict with the Gattuso family
I'm doing it. It is my duty to protect the family and you.
translation.es: Eso hago. Mi deber es proteger a la familia y protegerte a ti.

translation.en: What are you going to do to me? Beat me? Cut off my balls?
translation.es: ¿Qué me van a hacer? ¿Golpearme? ¿Cortarme las pelotas?

translation.en: If you'd only stolen from me, you'd be off the hook now.
translation.es: Si solo hubieras robado, estarías libre.

translation.en: But you decided to sell children to a brothel.

translation.en: Did you think I wouldn't find out?
- We all have skeletons in the closet-- - Shut up.
translation.es: - Todos tenemos secretos. - Cierra el pico.

translation.en: You have smeared the name of this family, Alfredo.
translation.es: Alfredo, manchaste el nombre de la familia.

translation.en: Spare me this bullshit, and shoot me.
No trace will be left of you...
But you have to know that he deserved it.
translation.es: Pero debes saber que se lo merecía.

translation.en: Cheating and stealing on his family.
translation.es: Había engañado y robado a su familia.

translation.en: He killed himself with what he'd been doing.
It wasn't me who changed your clothes. It was the maid.

translation.en: It's... It's one of the advantages of being a boss.
translation.es: Es una de las ventajas de ser el jefe.

translation.en: So, tell one of your butlers to bring my cell phone and laptop.

translation.en: I can see you've got your strength back.
You will have your cell phone and your laptop
if you need anything, Domenico is here to help you.

translation.en: Be ready in two hours, because we need to buy some stuff before we depart.

I'm not flying anywhere, unless it's Poland.
- it was an order. - Listen to me,
I'm not a bag of potatoes
that you can transfer without my permission.

translation.en: If that's your idea of how falling in love with you looks, you're fucking wrong.

translation.en: This is what you call a temper?
How many Polish girls do you know?
It looks like one is all I need to know.

translation.en: It will be a good year.
I just need to react quicker, 'cause I lose my vigilance when I'm around you.

translation.en: Domenico brought all of your stuff.
Impressive amount of shoes for a five- day holiday.

translation.en: I'll do my best to help you.

translation.en: I think your boss wants me to gain weight.
I think he just wants to take good care of you, you know?
But I think you're here to help me with everything what I need.

translation.en: So, I need you to sit down...
Today, I have some business to take care of.

translation.en: I said, I'm not going anywhere.
translation.es: Dije que no iré a ningún lado.

translation.es: Según la leyenda, ahí encerró Zeus a Tifón...

translation.en: a monster of 100 heads-- and that it's still trying to escape.

translation.en: So, Typhon didn't fall in love with Zeus in 365 days.
translation.es: Así que Tifón no se enamoró de Zeus en 365 días.

translation.en: - Get out, or else I-- - Else what?
Or I guarantee you, this is the last time you'll see it.
translation.es: O te garantizo que no lo volverás a ver.

translation.en: and I'm gonna decide when I'm going to see it.
Please, I need help. Can you help me?
Someone kidnapped me, and I need help.
If you feel like running, you should wear a different kind of shoes.

translation.en: You have to accept the situation.
The faster, the better for you.
translation.es: Cuanto más rápido, mejor para ti.

That you won't touch me without my permission.

Y algo normal para la cena.
- Te ves... - Me muero de hambre.

I will give him couple of lessons.

translation.en: So, what do you actually do?
ANNA WHY ARE YOU NOT REPLYING?
You want me to accept a year- long declaration,
translation.es: Si quieres que acepte un compromiso de un año,

translation.en: You will know exactly what you need to know.
The whole is a part of a bigger operation.
translation.es: Es parte de una organización más grande.

translation.en: I was chosen the head of this family after my dad's death.
translation.es: Tras la muerte de papá, me nombraron jefe de la familia.

translation.en: It was not what I wished for.
I would never have come to Sicily.

translation.en: I have to tell you something, though. I was offered a new job in Sicily.

translation.en: It's the best hotel on the island.

translation.en: Do you want anything from me, or you're just looking?
Why are you looking at it?
when your entire life is based on taking everything with force,
translation.es: ...cuando tu vida se basa en tomar todo por la fuerza,

Just untie me, you fucking wop, and I'll show you...

the whole deal might blow up.
We just need to pay them more.
Did you find her? Did you?
I've just said to my cousin that you're a marvelous, gentle woman.

translation.en: Is she going to bathe in the fountain?
Which period is that? Early Michelangelo or late Caravaggio?

translation.en: the slayer of lions and tiny women.

Open the door. I want to leave.

I'll do anything I want with you.
I was hoping you would do that.
Every time you move, it widens more and more.
I'm gonna show you what you're missing.

Are you asking me to begin?
I'm gonna fuck you so hard...
that they will hear you scream in Warsaw.
We need to be in one of my clubs in two hours.

This is not a fucking joke, okay?

A couple thousand euro of yours.
Are you afraid that I am too good at it?

translation.en: and could get inside me without taking it off.
You will be mine. I guarantee it.

Por fin una puta de verdad.

translation.en: I'm going to fuck you so hard, you won't be able to sit.

translation.en: Are you aware who you have shot, Massimo?
Do you know what you've done?
I couldn't just sit there and watch.
This means war. A war between two powerful families. Do you get that?

translation.en: Do that and ask Anna for forgiveness.

translation.en: And get rid of this damn boat, too.

translation.en: What's going on? Did you kill him?
translation.es: - ¿Qué sucede? ¿Lo mataste? - No es asunto tuyo.

translation.es: - ¿Qué sucede? ¿Lo mataste? - No es asunto tuyo. ¿Lo mataste?

- Stop it. Where are you going? - No. Get off me.
- Don't touch me! Fuck you! - Stop it!

But in the same time, I wanna kill you.

do you mind if I ask you to dance with me?
The first and real love of Massimo.
translation.es: El primer y verdadero amor de Massimo.

translation.en: I left her the day you landed in Sicily.

translation.en: Your portraits have been hanging in my house for years.
translation.es: Tus retratos llevan años en mi casa.

translation.en: Nobody believed that I will ever find you.
And... she didn't believe at all.
I will never let anyone hurt you.
Domenico will take you to the airport tomorrow.
translation.es: Domenico te llevará mañana al aeropuerto.

translation.en: You said that you want to visit your family.

translation.en: - Yes, but-- - There's an apartment waiting for you in Warsaw.

translation.en: I am going to kill you!
Just tell me one thing, okay?
- Martin. I had enough of him. - Did he piss you off?

translation.en: Jesus, I know it sounds ridiculous. I didn't want it, but things happened.
translation.es: Sé que suena absurdo. No quería, pero sucedió.

translation.en: What do you mean? He's got special needs? Is he sick?
I know, he has flat feet.
Imagine a strong alpha male, who always knows what he wants.
translation.es: Imagina un macho alfa fuerte que siempre sabe lo que quiere.

translation.en: He is your caretaker and your defender.
When you are with him, you feel like a little girl.

translation.en: He makes all your sexual fantasies come true.

has absolutely no body fat, and has been molded by God himself.

He comes from a rich, traditional Sicilian family.

translation.en: They don't take foreigners for wives.
Right, now spare me the bullshit.
translation.es: Ya no me digas más mentiras.

translation.en: I was kidnapped by a gangster, and then I fell in love with him.
translation.es: Me secuestró un mafioso y luego me enamoré de él.

translation.en: And the worst thing is that they keep me in the dark.
translation.es: Y lo peor es que no me dicen nada.

translation.en: They treat me like some kind of doll.
translation.es: Me tratan como a una muñeca.

translation.en: They sent me to Poland, and I still don't know a single thing.
translation.es: Me enviaron a Polonia y no sé por qué.

translation.en: That's why you need to fucking back out. Do you understand?
Fuck all the Massimos, Martins, and all the other mozzarellas.
translation.es: Al diablo con los idiotas como Massimo, Martin y los demás.

translation.en: Darius, just fucking look at you! Please, don't leave, though.
Can you tell me why you woke me up in the middle of the night? It's 1:00 p.m.
translation.es: ¿Por qué me despertaste a medianoche? Es la 1:00 p. m.

translation.en: Fucking rejuvenation time! Just look at her!
Greg, I want some volume here.
translation.es: Greg, quiero volumen en esta parte.

translation.en: What? Did you suddenly have a stroke?
I was offered the position of general manager at Preston.
translation.es: Me ofrecieron el puesto de gerente general en Preston.

translation.en: You will be fucking General Preston!
Great. Mozzarella turned her brain into pesto.
translation.es: Genial. El italiano te convirtió el cerebro en pesto.

translation.en: Now, that is some serious volume.
You're right. I'm not going to just lie down and smell nice.
translation.es: Tienes razón. No me quedaré cruzada de brazos.

translation.en: I'd like to lie down and smell nice...
There is a line to your ass.
- Bye. - ♪ 'Cause I'm here looking fine, babe ♪
It's for you. From that gentleman.
Where were you all this time?
I have nothing to say to you.
Laura, please. At least let me explain, and then I'll leave.
translation.es: Laura, por favor. Al menos déjame explicarte y me iré.

translation.en: Explain how your dick ended up in a different girl's ass?
translation.es: Explícame cómo terminaste acostándote con otra.

translation.en: The moment you ran off from that pool...
I thought this through. You were right. I ran after you, but you weren't there.
translation.es: Lo pensé y tenías razón. Fui por ti, pero te habías ido.

translation.en: I started looking for you. It got dark, so I went back to the hotel.
translation.es: Te busqué, pero volví al hotel al oscurecer.

translation.en: I found your letter, read it... and lost my mind.
translation.es: Encontré tu carta, la leí y perdí la cabeza.

translation.en: I decided I needed to get fucked up. I called Michał...
that fucking first drink was the last thing that I remember from that evening.
translation.es: El primer trago es lo último que recuerdo de esa noche.

translation.en: It doesn't change a thing if you remember or not.
translation.es: Que no lo recuerdes no cambia nada.

translation.en: We belong to two different worlds. There is no room for a woman in your life.
translation.es: Somos de mundos distintos. No hay lugar para una mujer en tu vida.

translation.en: And I am not going to be your toy. Do you understand?
But that is in the past.
translation.es: Pero eso quedó en el pasado.

translation.en: - But I don't miss you. - So, it was all fake?
translation.es: - Yo a ti, no. - ¿Todo fue una ilusión?

translation.en: It wasn't fake, but it wasn't a healthy relationship.
- Honey, let's talk. - We have nothing to talk about!
- Don't you get it? Nothing! - We do.
No! You have already told me what you had to say.
I don't understand what you two are saying,
but it's rather clear that she wants you to leave.
translation.es: ...pero está claro que quiere que te vayas.

translation.en: Do I have to say it so you'll understand?
But I think you've already met Martin.
Martin, come in! Come in, please!
Do you have any idea what I've been through?
translation.es: ¿Tienes idea de lo que he pasado?

translation.en: - ♪ All this magic in the air ♪ - No.
- Wanna bet? - ♪ Secured my place, I'm here to stay ♪
But do me a favor, and don't tell them exactly what you do.
translation.es: No les digas exactamente lo que haces.

translation.en: What do you want me to say?
Laura! You look great as a blonde!
Who is he? And what does he do?
My mom is asking what do you do for a living.
translation.es: Mi mamá pregunta a qué te dedicas.

translation.en: Really? You will be the first in our family.
translation.es: ¿En serio? Serás el primero de nuestra familia.

translation.en: So, what are your intentions with our daughter?
Sorry we didn't wait for you, but I have to travel to Palermo.
translation.es: Disculpa que no te esperáramos, pero debemos ir a Palermo.

translation.en: It's okay. I'm not hungry yet.
translation.es: Está bien. Aún no tengo hambre.

translation.en: - What's going on? - Well, nothing, really.
Domenico will take you to the doctor.
nobody from Poland can come to our wedding.
translation.es: ...que nadie de Polonia puede venir a nuestra boda.

translation.en: You said it yourself that you don't want them to know what I do.
translation.es: Dijiste que no querías que supieran lo que hago.

translation.en: But I would love to have my best friend to be next to me.
translation.es: Pero me encantaría tener a mi mejor amiga a mi lado.

translation.en: I think you don't like me, Mario.
translation.es: Creo que no te caigo bien, Mario.

translation.en: that you have caused some commotion...

translation.es: que sea más tranquila que tú.

translation.en: I can't believe it! Are you fucking out of your mind?
You have known each other for two months!
I'll smoke two for your sake.
I don't get it. He forced you, right?
I'll tear him apart when I see him!
Olga, he doesn't know I'm pregnant!
He doesn't. And when he proposed, I said yes willingly.
translation.es: No me obliga. Y cuando me lo propuso, le dije que sí.

translation.en: Laura, you are trapped in a cage!
Don't you see it? It's a golden cage, but you are still a fucking prisoner!
translation.es: ¿No lo ves? Es una jaula de oro, pero ¡eres una prisionera!

translation.en: Do you know what you are up against?
What are you talking about? A cage?
- What am I supposed to do? - I don't know.
Stop yelling. Do you take me for a fool? You think I didn't know what I was doing?
translation.es: Deja de gritar. ¿Crees que soy tonta y que no sé lo que hago?

translation.en: I love you, do you hear me?
I will always be there for you.
We will raise the child together.
It will be a beautiful child with beautiful parents.

translation.es: No será listo, pero no importa.

translation.en: How long do we have to wait?
How long can you pamper yourself?
I want to be with him and keep the child.
translation.es: Quiero estar con él y tener al niño.

translation.en: Well, you could stay for a while in Sicily.
translation.es: Podrías quedarte un tiempo en Sicilia.

translation.en: What do you think I am here for?
Okay, stop talking me up. Just call him.
How long does it take to try on a dress? As long as it takes.
translation.es: - ¿Cuánto tardas en probarte un vestido? - Cuanto sea necesario.

translation.en: - Where is Massimo? - By the swimming pool.
